lst.name: sentence
lst.str: U.K. Property company Greycoat Group Plc is seeking two financings, one for 120 mln stg and the other for 16 mln stg, in connection with its Embankment Place development above and around Charing Cross station in London, banking sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The first credit, a project financing, will carry a basic margin of 5/8 point over London Interbank Offered Rates (LIBOR), with an additional 1/4 pct per annum payable on outstanding amounts to the extent that the property is not substantially pre-let.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The second transaction, a 16 mln stg credit for the purpose of working capital, is being arranged by Rothschild alone on behalf of the Greycoat Group Plc itself.
